metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39832 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in PSPP 1.6.2. There is a heap-based bufferoverflow at the function read_string in utilities/pspp-dump-sav.c, whichallows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) orpossibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: pspp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
